name: HIPS_VR (WIP)
description:
HIPS_VR is a fan-made project that takes the concept from an old Xbox-360 Game Called Hidden In Plain Sight.

Made for Oculus Rift S in Unity.

Local multiplayer, up to 6 controller users and 1 VR user.

The VR Player Is Sheriff Moose and is here to find the players using controllers/Keyboard.

This may get more updates in the future if it gets even a little popular. (Like 8 people)

Press A button on gamePads to spawn in / WASD on keyboard.
